column2: Whether the charges for Installation/Laying of the submarine cable should be part

of  the  dutiable  value  of  the 
imported  goods,  or  treated  as  post-importation
Whether  the  Customs  inquiry  was  conducted  in  breach  of  natural  justice.  The
Petitioner  alleges  in  particular  that  the  inquiry  officer,  in  issuing  the  show  cause
charges, failed to provide reasons or disclose the basis of the allegations, thereby
denying  the Petitioner a fair opportunity to defend itself.  Further, avers that the
entire process was biased and predetermined to impose a penalty.
